itunes:title: Sharing His Bathroom With Strangers
title: Sharing His Bathroom With Strangers
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Joe finds a picture of Ilya before the world ends, Ilya helps a stray dog, and everyone in town is using Ilya's private bathroom as their go to spot. Plus Annelise confronts Ilya about meetings and Joe runs for president.


Follow us on instagram @lightweightspod
